oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Grand Army of the Republic badge
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is the the badge of the Grand Army of the Republic, the largest Union veterans organization in the post Civil War time period. The GAR hosted reunions, provided aid to veterans and theit spouses and orphaned children. This badge is slighlty different from most in that it has an older US flag replacement ribbon and the pin bar mimics a US Army infantry captain's shoulder board.
